comment: * Interface for rendering subtitles onto a Canvas.

methods.name: public void setOnChangedListener(OnChangedListener callback)
methods.comment:
* Sets the widget's callback, which is used to send updates when the
         * rendered data has changed.
         *
         * @param callback update callback

methods.name: public void setSize(int width, int height)
methods.comment:
* Sets the widget's size.
         *
         * @param width width in pixels
         * @param height height in pixels

methods.name: public void setVisible(boolean visible)
methods.comment:
* Sets whether the widget should draw subtitles.
         *
         * @param visible true if subtitles should be drawn, false otherwise

methods.name: public void draw(Canvas c)
methods.comment:
* Renders subtitles onto a {@link Canvas}.
         *
         * @param c canvas on which to render subtitles

methods.name: public void onAttachedToWindow()
methods.comment: * Called when the widget is attached to a window.

methods.name: public void onDetachedFromWindow()
methods.comment: * Called when the widget is detached from a window.

methodNames: public void setSize(int width, int height)
